column4: Hi, I can not play music and lspci gives me: Audio device: ATI Technologies Inc SB450 HDA Audio (rev 01). Can someone help me please?
TiMiDo you have no sound at all ? or can you play the samples files ?
posted that erlier, but again: 00:14.2 Audio device: ATI Technologies Inc SB450 HDA Audio (rev 01)
TiMiDo at System - Preferences - Sound you can choose among some sound systems and test then ... does anyone produces sound?
I've done it before, still no sound
the page tells how to compile the sound system... but maybe is better to follow "Manually Specify Module Parameters" before compiling... to test the atual sound system
have you tried what Bubble said?
did it, my sound is working
did it before and it did not work, after a while it did...
